scripts.e2e: npm-run-all --parallel test:dmaone test:dmatwo test:dmathree test:dmafour test:dmafive test:dmasix test:dmasev
scripts.test:paralleldma: npm-run-all --parallel test:dmaone test:dmatwo test:dmathree test:dmafour test:dmafive
scripts.e2e:todo: npm-run-all --parallel test:todoone test:todotwo test:todothree test:todofour test:todofive
scripts.test:todotwo: timeout /t 2 && cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/1-getting-started/todo.cy.ts --env agentUsername=perftesttwo --browser edge
scripts.test:todothree: timeout /t 2 && cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/1-getting-started/todo.cy.ts --env agentUsername=perftestthree --browser edge
scripts.test:todofour: timeout /t 4 && cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/1-getting-started/todo.cy.ts --env agentUsername=perftestfour --browser edge
scripts.test:todofive: timeout /t 6 && cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/1-getting-started/todo.cy.ts --env agentUsername=perftestfive --browser edge
scripts.test:todosix: timeout /t 8 && cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/1-getting-started/todo.cy.ts --env agentUsername=perftestsix --browser edge
scripts.test:todosev: timeout /t 10 && cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/1-getting-started/todo.cy.ts --env agentUsername=perftestsev --browser edge
scripts.test:todoeight: timeout /t 12 && cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/1-getting-started/todo.cy.ts --env agentUsername=perftesteight --browser edge
scripts.test:todonine: timeout /t 2 && cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/1-getting-started/todo.cy.ts --env agentUsername=perftestnine --browser edge
scripts.test:todoten: timeout /t 2 && cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/1-getting-started/todo.cy.ts --env agentUsername=perftestten --browser edge
scripts.test:paralleltodo: npm-run-all --parallel test:todoone test:todotwo test:todothree test:todofour test:todofive test:todosix test:todosev test:todoeight test:todonine test:todoten
